# Python cache and compiled files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd
*.egg-info/

# Virtual environments
venv/
.venv/
ENV/
env/
env.bak/
.venv.bak/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Streamlit config and cache
.streamlit/
.cache/

# Jupyter checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Large data or model folders
data/
models/
